name: Charm Girls Club Pajama Party
description:
Charm Girls Club™ Pajama Party is packed with over 30 mini-games that will get girls up dancing, pillow fighting, cooking, racing, spinning, moving, and playing together in ways that will keep them laughing all night! Create your Charm Girls and team up with up to 7 girl friends! Includes awesome mini-games including Bed Bounce, Speed Hair Teasing, Balloon Bop, Dance Off, Pose Off, Pillow Fight, and more! Earn over 40 virtual charms!

  • Customize Your Charm Girl – Create endless trendy and stylish looks and customize a Charm Girl to reflect your unique style. Choose everything from hair, make-up, wardrobe, shoes and accessories!
  • Meet Your New BFFs – The Charm Girls – Anna, Sara, Olivia and Emilie – are the BFFs every girl dreams of. The Charm Girls will guide you on adventures, encouraging you along the way, like all best friends do.
  • Collect Virtual Charms – Completing challenges can earn you sparkly new virtual charms for your jewelry box. Show off your charms to your friends and see who can collect the most!
